00051 bool XML_parser::parse_general_configuration_file(string cfg_file)
00052 {
00053     struct DDS_XMLParser *parser     = NULL;
00054     struct DDS_XMLObject *root       = NULL;
00055     cc_general_properties general_properties;
00056     
00057     struct DDS_XMLExtensionClass *user_extensions[DTD_CAVECANEM_EXTENSION_NUMBER] = 
00058         {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL};
00059     
00060     const char * CAVECANEM_DTD[DTD_CAVECANEM_LINE_NUMBER] = {
00061         "<!ELEMENT cavecanem (general,dds_properties,plugins)>\n",
00062         "<!ELEMENT general (publishing_period_sec)>\n",
00063         "<!ELEMENT publishing_period_sec (#PCDATA)>\n",
00064         "<!ELEMENT dds_properties (dds_domain_id,dds_qos_file,dds_qos_default_library,dds_qos_default_profile)>\n",
00065         "<!ELEMENT dds_domain_id (#PCDATA)>\n",
00066         "<!ELEMENT dds_qos_file (#PCDATA)>\n",
00067         "<!ELEMENT dds_qos_default_library (#PCDATA)>\n",
00068         "<!ELEMENT dds_qos_default_profile (#PCDATA)>\n",
00069         "<!ELEMENT plugins (plugin_library*)>\n",
00070         "<!ELEMENT plugin_library (plugin+|plugin_regex)>\n",
00071         "<!ATTLIST plugin_library dir CDATA #REQUIRED>",
00072         "<!ELEMENT plugin_regex (#PCDATA)>\n",
00073         "<!ELEMENT plugin (#PCDATA)>\n"
00074     };
00075     
00076     parser = DDS_XMLParser_new();
00077     if(parser == NULL) {
00078         cerr << "Error creating XML parser" << endl;
00079         return false;
00080     }
00081 
00082     if(!register_general_extensions(parser,user_extensions)) {
00083         DDS_XMLParser_delete(parser);
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086     
00087     root =  DDS_XMLParser_parse_from_file(parser, 
00088                                           CAVECANEM_DTD,
00089                                           DTD_CAVECANEM_LINE_NUMBER,
00090                                           cfg_file.c_str(),
00091                                           NULL);
00092     
00093     if(root == NULL) {
00094         cerr << cfg_file << " is not a valid configuration file" << endl;
00095         DDS_XMLParser_delete(parser);
00096         return false;
00097     }
00098 
00099     DDS_XMLParser_delete(parser);
00100     return true;
00101 
00102     
00103 }
00104

00115 bool XML_parser::parse_plugin_configuration_file(string cfg_file)
00116 {
00117  
00118     cc_plugin_properties plugin_properties;
00119     struct DDS_XMLParser *parser     = NULL;
00120     struct DDS_XMLObject *root       = NULL;
00121     
00122     struct DDS_XMLExtensionClass *user_extensions[DTD_CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_EXTENSION_NUMBER] = 
00123         {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL,NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL};
00124     
00125     const char * CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_DTD[DTD_CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_LINE_NUMBER] = {
00126         "<!ELEMENT plugin (dll,create_function,publishing_period_sec,dds_properties,plugin_config,type_definition)>\n",

00133         "<!ELEMENT dds_qos_profile (#PCDATA)>\n",
00134         "<!ELEMENT dds_topic_name (#PCDATA)>\n",

00427         "<!ATTLIST valuetype topLevel (true|false|1|0) \"true\">\n",
00428         "<!ELEMENT include EMPTY>\n",
00429         "<!ATTLIST include file CDATA #REQUIRED >\n",
00430         "<!ELEMENT struct (member|directive)+>\n",
00431         "<!ATTLIST struct name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00432         "<!ATTLIST struct topLevel (true|false|1|0) \"true\">\n",
00433         "<!ELEMENT union (discriminator,(case|directive)+)>\n",
00434         "<!ATTLIST union name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00435         "<!ATTLIST union topLevel (true|false|1|0) \"true\">\n",
00436         "<!ELEMENT const EMPTY>\n",
00437         "<!ATTLIST const name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00438         "<!ATTLIST const value CDATA #REQUIRED>\n",
00439         "<!ATTLIST const type (char|string|short|long|float|boolean|double|octet|wchar|wstring|longLong|unsignedLongLong|longShort|longDouble|unsignedShort|unsignedLong|nonBasic) #REQUIRED>\n",
00440         "<!ATTLIST const nonBasicTypeName CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00441         "<!ATTLIST const resolveName (true|false|1|0) #IMPLIED>\n",
00442         "<!ELEMENT discriminator EMPTY>\n",
00443         "<!ATTLIST discriminator type (char|string|short|long|float|boolean|double|octet|wchar|wstring|longLong|unsignedLongLong|longShort|longDouble|unsignedShort|unsignedLong|nonBasic) #REQUIRED>\n",
00444         "<!ATTLIST discriminator nonBasicTypeName CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00445         "<!ELEMENT case ((caseDiscriminator)+,member)>\n",
00446         "<!ELEMENT caseDiscriminator EMPTY>\n",
00447         "<!ATTLIST caseDiscriminator value CDATA #REQUIRED>\n",
00448         "<!ELEMENT member EMPTY>\n",
00449         "<!ATTLIST member name NMTOKEN #IMPLIED>\n",
00450         "<!ATTLIST member visibility (public|private) #IMPLIED>\n",
00451         "<!ATTLIST member pointer (true|false|1|0) #IMPLIED>\n",
00452         "<!ATTLIST member type (char|string|short|long|float|boolean|double|octet|wchar|wstring|longLong|unsignedLongLong|longShort|longDouble|unsignedShort|unsignedLong|nonBasic) #REQUIRED>\n",
00453         "<!ATTLIST member nonBasicTypeName CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00454         "<!ATTLIST member bitField CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00455         "<!ATTLIST member stringMaxLength CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00456         "<!ATTLIST member sequenceMaxLength CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00457         "<!ATTLIST member key (true|false|1|0) \"false\">\n",
00458         "<!ATTLIST member resolveName (true|false|1|0) #IMPLIED>\n",
00459         "<!ATTLIST member arrayDimensions CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00460         "<!ELEMENT typedef EMPTY>\n",
00461         "<!ATTLIST typedef name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00462         "<!ATTLIST typedef type (char|string|short|long|float|boolean|double|octet|wchar|wstring|longLong|unsignedLongLong|longShort|longDouble|unsignedShort|unsignedLong|nonBasic) #REQUIRED>\n",
00463         "<!ATTLIST typedef nonBasicTypeName CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00464         "<!ATTLIST typedef stringMaxLength CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00465         "<!ATTLIST typedef sequenceMaxLength CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00466         "<!ATTLIST typedef pointer (true|false|1|0) #IMPLIED>\n",
00467         "<!ATTLIST typedef resolveName (true|false|1|0) #IMPLIED>\n",
00468         "<!ATTLIST typedef arrayDimensions CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00469         "<!ATTLIST typedef topLevel (true|false|1|0) \"true\">\n",
00470         "<!ELEMENT enum (enumerator)+>\n",
00471         "<!ATTLIST enum name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00472         "<!ELEMENT enumerator EMPTY>\n",
00473         "<!ATTLIST enumerator name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00474         "<!ATTLIST enumerator value CDATA #IMPLIED>\n",
00475         "<!ELEMENT forward_dcl EMPTY>\n",
00476         "<!ATTLIST forward_dcl name NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00477         "<!ATTLIST forward_dcl kind NMTOKEN #REQUIRED>\n",
00478         "<!ELEMENT directive (#PCDATA) >\n",
00479         "<!ATTLIST directive kind (copy|copyC|copyJava|copyDeclaration|copyCDeclaration|copyJavaDeclaration|copyCppcli|copyCppcliDeclaration) #REQUIRED>\n"
00480     };
00481 
00482 
00483     parser = DDS_XMLParser_new();
00484     if(parser == NULL) {
00485         cerr << "Error creating XML parser" << endl;
00486         return false;
00487     }
00488         
00489     if(!register_plugin_extensions(parser,user_extensions)) {
00490         DDS_XMLParser_delete(parser);
00491         return false;
00492     }
00493     
00494     root =  DDS_XMLParser_parse_from_file(parser, 
00495                                           CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_DTD,
00496                                           DTD_CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_LINE_NUMBER,
00497                                           cfg_file.c_str(),
00498                                           NULL);
00499     
00500     if(root == NULL) {
00501         cerr << cfg_file << " is not a valid configuration file" << endl;
00502         DDS_XMLParser_delete(parser);
00503         return false;
00504     }
00505     
00506         
00507     DDS_XMLParser_delete(parser);
00508     return true; 
00509         
00510 }

00525 {

00529                                                      NULL,

00531                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00532                                                      XML_parser_start,

00709         if(!DDS_XMLParser_register_extension_class(parser, user_extensions[i]))
00710             cerr << "Error registering the extension "  << endl;

00712     // }

00714 
00715     return true;
00716

00720 
00721 
00732 bool XML_parser::register_plugin_extensions(struct DDS_XMLParser *self,
00733                                             struct DDS_XMLExtensionClass **user_extensions) 
00734 {
00735     int i=0;
00736     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("plugin", 
00737                                                      NULL,
00738                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00739                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00740                                                      XML_parser_start,
00741                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00742                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00743                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00744     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00745         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'plugin'" << endl;
00746         return false;
00747     }
00748 
00749     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("dll", 
00750                                                      NULL,
00751                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00752                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00753                                                      XML_parser_start,
00754                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00755                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00756                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00757     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00758         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'dll'" << endl;
00759         return false;
00760     }
00761 
00762     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("create_function", 
00763                                                      NULL,
00764                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00765                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00766                                                      XML_parser_start,
00767                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00768                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00769                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00770     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00771         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'create_function'" << endl;
00772         return false;
00773     }
00774 
00775     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("publishing_period_sec", 
00776                                                      NULL,
00777                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00778                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00779                                                      XML_parser_start,
00780                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00781                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00782                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00783     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00784         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'publishing_period_sec'" << endl;
00785         return false;
00786     }
00787 
00788 
00789     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("dds_properties", 
00790                                                      NULL,
00791                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00792                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00793                                                      XML_parser_start,
00794                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00795                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00796                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00797     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00798         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'dds_properties'" << endl;
00799         return false;
00800     }
00801 
00802   
00803     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("dds_qos_library",
00804                                                      NULL,
00805                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00806                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00807                                                      XML_parser_start,
00808                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00809                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00810                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00811     
00812     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00813         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'qos_library'" << endl;
00814         return false;
00815     }
00816     
00817     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("dds_qos_profile",
00818                                                      NULL,
00819                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00820                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00821                                                      XML_parser_start,
00822                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00823                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00824                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00825     
00826     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00827         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'qos_profile'" << endl;
00828         return false;
00829     }
00830 
00831     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("dds_topic_name",
00832                                                      NULL,
00833                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00834                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00835                                                      XML_parser_start,
00836                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00837                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00838                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00839     
00840     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00841         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'dds_topic_name'" << endl;
00842         return false;
00843     }
00844 
00845                                                   
00846     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("plugin_config",
00847                                                      NULL,
00848                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00849                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00850                                                      XML_parser_start,
00851                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00852                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00853                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00854     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00855         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'plugin_config'" << endl;
00856         return false;
00857     }
00858 
00859         
00860     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("plugin_element",
00861                                                      NULL,
00862                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00863                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00864                                                      XML_parser_start,
00865                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00866                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00867                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00868     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00869         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'element'" << endl;
00870         return false;
00871     }
00872 
00873     user_extensions[i++] = DDS_XMLExtensionClass_new("type_definition",
00874                                                      NULL,
00875                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE,
00876                                                      DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE,
00877                                                      XML_parser_start,
00878                                                      XML_parser_plugin_end,
00879                                                      XML_parser_new, 
00880                                                      XML_parser_delete);
00881     if(user_extensions[i-1] == NULL) {
00882         cerr << "RTIXMLExtensionClass_new Error: could not install custom extension 'types'" << endl;
00883         return false;
00884     }
00885 
00886 
00887     for(int i=0; i<DTD_CAVECANEM_PLUGIN_EXTENSION_NUMBER; i++)
00888         if(!DDS_XMLParser_register_extension_class(self, user_extensions[i]))
00889             cerr << "Error registering the extension " << endl;
00890     
00891     return true;
00892 }

01153 void XML_parser::set_plugin_properties(string plugin_name)
01154 {
01155     if(tmp_plugin_properties_.topic_name.size() > 0) {
01156         plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name] = tmp_plugin_properties_;
01157     }
01158     
01159     else {
01160         tmp_plugin_properties_.topic_name = plugin_name;
01161         plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name] = tmp_plugin_properties_; 
01162     }
01163     
01164     tmp_plugin_properties_.dll = "";
01165     tmp_plugin_properties_.create_function = "";
01166     tmp_plugin_properties_.qos_library = "";
01167     tmp_plugin_properties_.qos_profile = "";
01168     tmp_plugin_properties_.datawriter_qos = NULL;
01169     tmp_plugin_properties_.topic_name = "";
01170     tmp_plugin_properties_.plugin_config.clear();
01171 
01172 }

01188 
01189 
01201 void XML_parser_start(struct DDS_XMLObject *self,
01202                       const char *tag_name,
01203                       const char **attr,
01204                       struct DDS_XMLContext *context)
01205 {
01206 
01207 
01208 
01209     int i = 0, length = 0;
01210     const char **str = NULL;
01211     RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement *element = NULL;
01212     RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject *object = 
01213         (RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject *)self;
01214 
01215     
01216 
01217     // RTIXMLLog_testPrecondition(context == NULL, return);
01218     // RTIXMLLog_testPrecondition(self == NULL || tag_name == NULL, context->error = RTI_TRUE; return);
01219 
01220     RTIOsapiHeap_allocateStructure(&element, RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement);
01221     
01222     if (element == NULL) {
01223         // RTIXMLLog_exception( METHOD_NAME,
01224         //                      &RTI_OSAPI_MEMORY_LOG_OUT_OF_HEAP_STRUCT_d,
01225         //                      sizeof(struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement));
01226         /* We relase the memory of each element in the finalize method*/
01227         context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01228         return;
01229     }
01230     
01231     element->tag_name = REDAString_duplicate(tag_name);
01232 
01233     if (element->tag_name == NULL) {
01234         // RTIXMLLog_exception(METHOD_NAME,
01235         //                     &RTI_OSAPI_MEMORY_LOG_OUT_OF_HEAP_STRING_d,
01236         //                     strlen(tag_name));
01237         /* We relase the memory of each element in the finalize method*/
01238         context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01239         return;
01240     }
01241     
01242     /* Gets to know the attributes matrix size */
01243     for (str = attr; *str != '\0'; str++) {
01244         ++length;
01245     }
01246     
01247     /* length is always goint to be either 1 or an odd value */
01248     element->attr_length = length;
01249 
01250     /* Copying attributes */
01251     if (length > 0) {
01252         /* Allocate memory for the attributes of the element */
01253         RTIOsapiHeap_allocateArray(&element->attr, element->attr_length+1, char *);
01254 
01255         if (element->attr == NULL) {
01256             // RTIXMLLog_exception(METHOD_NAME,
01257             //                 &RTI_OSAPI_MEMORY_LOG_OUT_OF_HEAP_ARRAY_dd,
01258             //                 element->attr_length, sizeof(char *));
01259 
01260             context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01261             return;
01262         }
01263 
01264         for (i = 0; i < element->attr_length; i++) {    
01265             RTIOsapiHeap_allocateString(&element->attr[i], (int)strlen(attr[i]));
01266 
01267             if (element->attr[i] == NULL) {
01268                 // RTIXMLLog_exception(METHOD_NAME,
01269                 //             &RTI_OSAPI_MEMORY_LOG_OUT_OF_HEAP_STRING_d,
01270                 //             strlen(attr[i]));
01271                 
01272                 context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01273                 return;
01274             }
01275             strcpy(element->attr[i], attr[i]);
01276         }
01277 
01278 
01279     }
01280 
01281     /* Storing the RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement */
01282     if( object->current_element_index < XML_CAVECANEM_MAX_NUMBER_OF_NON_EXTENSION_TAGS){
01283         object->tag_elements[object->current_element_index++] = element;
01284         
01285     } 
01286     else {
01287         // RTIXMLLog_exception( METHOD_NAME,
01288         //                      &RTI_LOG_ANY_s,
01289         //                      "error processing object tag: number of non tags overpassed");
01290 
01291         /* We relase the memory of each element in the finalize method*/
01292         context->error = DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01293         return;
01294     } 
01295 
01296 }    
01297 
01298 
01309 void XML_parser_general_end(struct DDS_XMLObject *self,
01310                             const char *tag_name,
01311                             const char *element_text,
01312                             struct DDS_XMLContext *context)
01313 {
01314 
01315 
01316     //printf("%s %s\n", METHOD_NAME, tagName); 
01317     struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject * object = (struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject *)self;
01318     
01319 
01320     if(!strcmp(tag_name,"publishing_period_sec")) {
01321         // aux_general_properties.publishing_period = atoi(element_text);
01322         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_publishing_period(atoi(element_text));
01323     }
01324     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"dds_domain_id")) {
01325         // aux_general_properties.domain_id = atoi(element_text);
01326         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_domain_id(atoi(element_text));
01327     }
01328     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"dds_qos_file")) {
01329         // aux_general_properties.qos_file = string(element_text);
01330         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_qos_file(string(element_text));
01331     }
01332     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"dds_qos_default_library")) {
01333         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_qos_default_library(string(element_text));
01334     }
01335     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"dds_qos_default_profile")) {
01336         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_qos_default_profile(string(element_text));
01337     }
01338     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"plugin_library")) {
01339         string dir(RTIXMLHelper_getAttribute((const char**)object->attr, "dir"));
01340 
01341         list<string> tmp_plugin_list = 
01342             XML_parser::get_singleton()->get_tmp_plugin_list();
01343         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_plugin_library(dir,tmp_plugin_list);
01344 
01345         XML_parser::get_singleton()->clear_tmp_plugin_list();
01346     }
01347     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "plugin")) {
01348         XML_parser::get_singleton()->add_tmp_plugin(string(element_text));
01349 
01350     }
01351     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"plugin_regex")) {
01352     }
01353    
01354 }
01355 
01356 
01367 void XML_parser_plugin_end(struct DDS_XMLObject *self,
01368                            const char *tag_name,
01369                            const char *element_text,
01370                            struct DDS_XMLContext *context)
01371 {
01372 
01373   
01374    struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject * object = (struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject *)self;
01375     
01376     //Load plugin configuration-----------------------------------
01377     if(!strcmp(tag_name,"plugin")) {
01378         string name(RTIXMLHelper_getAttribute((const char**)object->attr, "name"));
01379         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_plugin_properties(name);
01380     }
01381 
01382     //DLL of the plugin-------------------------------------------
01383     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"dll")) {
01384         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_dll(string(element_text));
01385     }
01386   
01387     //Create function of the plugin-------------------------------
01388     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"create_function")) {
01389         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_create_function(string(element_text));
01390     }
01391     
01392     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "publishing_period_sec")) { 
01393         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_publishing_period(atoi(element_text));
01394     }
01395     //dds properties of the plugin--------------------------------
01396     else if(!strcmp(tag_name,"dds_properties")) {
01397         struct DDS_XMLObject *xml_object;
01398         const char *aux_tag_name;
01399 
01400         xml_object = DDS_XMLObject_get_first_child((struct DDS_XMLObject *)self);
01401         
01402         while (xml_object != NULL) {
01403             aux_tag_name = DDS_XMLObject_get_tag_name(xml_object);
01404             
01405             //DataWriter QoS
01406             if(!strcmp(aux_tag_name, "datawriter_qos")) {
01407 
01408                 const struct DDS_DataWriterQos *datawriter_qos;
01409 
01410                 datawriter_qos = 
01411                     DDS_XMLDataWriterQos_get_dds_qos((struct DDS_XMLDataWriterQos *) 
01412                                                      xml_object);
01413 
01414                 XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_datawriter_qos(datawriter_qos);
01415 
01416             }
01417             
01418             xml_object = DDS_XMLObject_get_next_sibling(xml_object);
01419         }
01420     }
01421 
01422             
01423     //DDS QoS Library
01424     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "dds_qos_library")) {
01425         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_qos_library(string(element_text));
01426     }
01427     
01428     //DDS QoS Profile
01429     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "dds_qos_profile")) {
01430         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_qos_profile(string(element_text));
01431     }
01432     
01433     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "dds_topic_name")) {
01434         XML_parser::get_singleton()->set_tmp_plugin_properties_topic_name(string(element_text));
01435     }
01436 
01437     //Plugin elements--------------------------------------
01438     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "plugin_element")) {
01439         string name(RTIXMLHelper_getAttribute((const char**)object->attr, "name"));
01440         XML_parser::get_singleton()->
01441             set_tmp_plugin_properties_add_element(name,
01442                                                   string(element_text));
01443     }
01444 
01445     //Type definition-------------------------------------
01446     else if(!strcmp(tag_name, "type_definition")) {
01447 
01448         const char* type_name = 
01449         RTIXMLHelper_getAttribute((const char**)object->attr, "type_name");
01450 
01451         const struct DDS_TypeCode* aux_typecode = 
01452             XML_parser::get_singleton()->get_type_code_from_XML(self,
01453                                                                 type_name,
01454                                                                 context);
01455         XML_parser::get_singleton()->
01456             set_tmp_plugin_properties_type_code((DDS_TypeCode *) aux_typecode);
01457         
01458     }
01459 
01460        
01461 }
01462 
01463 
01475  struct DDS_XMLObject * XML_parser_new(const struct DDS_XMLExtensionClass *extension_class,
01476                                      const struct DDS_XMLObject *parent_object,
01477                                      const char **attr,
01478                                      struct DDS_XMLContext *context)
01479 {
01480     struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject *me = NULL;
01481 
01482 
01483     RTIOsapiHeap_allocateStructure(&me, struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject);
01484 
01485 
01486     if (me == NULL) {
01487         cerr << "Error: me NULL " << endl;
01488         context->error = DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01489         return NULL;
01490     }
01491     
01492     /* Initializes the RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject object  */
01493     if (!RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject_initialize(me, extension_class, parent_object, attr, context)) {
01494         cerr << "Error: init extension" << endl;
01495         RTIOsapiHeap_freeStructure(me);
01496         context->error = DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01497         return NULL;
01498     }
01499 
01500     return &me->base;
01501 }
01502 
01503 
01510 void XML_parser_delete(struct DDS_XMLObject * self)
01511 {
01512 
01513     struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject * object = (struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject *)self;
01514     
01515 
01516     RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject_finalize(object);
01517     RTIOsapiHeap_freeStructure(object);    
01518 }
01519 
01520 
01521 
01534 RTIBool RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject_initialize(struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject * self,
01535                                                   const struct DDS_XMLExtensionClass * extension_class,
01536                                                   const struct DDS_XMLObject * parent_object,
01537                                                   const char ** attr,
01538                                                   struct DDS_XMLContext * context) 
01539 {    
01540 
01541     int i = 0, j = 0, length = 0;
01542     const char ** str = NULL;
01543     const char * name = NULL;
01544 
01545     if (self->base.parent._init == DDS_XML_MAGIC_NUMBER) {
01546         return DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01547     }
01548     
01549     RTIOsapiMemory_zero(self,sizeof(struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject));
01550 
01551     /* Gets to know the attributes matrix size */
01552     for (str = attr; *str != '\0'; str++) {
01553         ++length;
01554     }
01555 
01556     /* length is always goint to be an odd value */
01557     self->attr_length = length;
01558 
01559     /* Initializing attributes */
01560     if (length > 0) {
01561         /* Allocate memory for the attributes of the given input object */
01562         RTIOsapiHeap_allocateArray(&self->attr, self->attr_length+1, char *);
01563 
01564         if (self->attr == NULL) {
01565             // RTIXMLLog_exception(METHOD_NAME,
01566             //                  &RTI_OSAPI_MEMORY_LOG_OUT_OF_HEAP_ARRAY_dd,
01567             //                  self->attr_length, sizeof(char *));
01568             self->attr_length = 0;
01569 
01570             context->error = DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01571             return DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE;
01572         }
01573 
01574         for (i = 0; i < self->attr_length; i++) {
01575             RTIOsapiHeap_allocateString(&self->attr[i], (int)strlen(attr[i]));
01576 
01577             if (self->attr[i] == NULL) {
01578                 // RTIXMLLog_exception(METHOD_NAME,
01579                 //             &RTI_OSAPI_MEMORY_LOG_OUT_OF_HEAP_STRING_d,
01580                 //             strlen(attr[i]));
01581 
01582                 for (j = 0; self->attr[j] != NULL; j++) {
01583                     RTIOsapiHeap_freeString(self->attr[j]);
01584                 }
01585                 RTIOsapiHeap_freeArray(self->attr);
01586                 self->attr_length = 0;
01587                 context->error = DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01588                 return DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE;
01589             }
01590             strcpy(self->attr[i], attr[i]);
01591         }
01592     }
01593 
01594     /* Initializing RTIXMLParserObjectElement array */
01595     for( i = 0; i < XML_CAVECANEM_MAX_NUMBER_OF_NON_EXTENSION_TAGS; i++){
01596         self->tag_elements[i] = NULL;
01597     }
01598 
01599     name = RTIXMLHelper_getAttribute(attr,"name");
01600 
01601     /* Initializes the RTIXMLObject with the name */
01602     if (!DDS_XMLObject_initialize(&self->base, extension_class, parent_object, name, NULL)) {
01603 
01604         // RTIXMLLog_exception( METHOD_NAME, &RTI_LOG_INIT_FAILURE_s, 
01605         //                      "RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject" );
01606         
01607         for( i = 0; i < self->attr_length; i++){
01608             if (self->attr[i] != NULL) {            
01609                 RTIOsapiHeap_freeString(self->attr[i]);
01610             }
01611         }
01612         RTIOsapiHeap_freeArray(self->attr);
01613         self->attr_length = 0;
01614 
01615         context->error = DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;
01616         return DDS_BOOLEAN_FALSE;
01617     }
01618 
01619 
01620     return DDS_BOOLEAN_TRUE;       
01621 
01622 }
01623 
01624 
01631 void RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject_finalize(struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObject * self)
01632 {
01633 
01634     struct RTIXMLCaveCanemExtensionObjectElement * ptr = NULL;
01635     int counter = 0, i = 0;
01636 
01637     // RTIXMLLog_testPrecondition(self == NULL, return);
01638     
01639     if (self->base.parent._init != DDS_XML_MAGIC_NUMBER) {
01640         return;
01641     }
01642 
01643     /* Finalizing elements (object attribute tags) of the given input object */
01644     ptr = self->tag_elements[counter];
01645 
01646     while (ptr != NULL && counter < XML_CAVECANEM_MAX_NUMBER_OF_NON_EXTENSION_TAGS){
01647 
01648         /* Finalizing tagName */
01649         if (ptr->tag_name != NULL) {
01650             RTIOsapiHeap_freeString(ptr->tag_name);
01651         }
01652 
01653         /* Finalizing elementText */
01654         if (ptr->element_text != NULL) {
01655             RTIOsapiHeap_freeString(ptr->element_text);
01656         }
01657 
01658         /* Finalizing attributes */
01659         if (ptr->attr != NULL) {
01660             for( i = 0; i < ptr->attr_length; i++) {
01661                 if (ptr->attr[i] != NULL) {                
01662                     RTIOsapiHeap_freeString(ptr->attr[i]);
01663                 }
01664             }
01665             /* Finalizing array of the attributes */
01666             RTIOsapiHeap_freeArray(ptr->attr);
01667         }
01668 
01669         /* Finalizing the object attribute tag itself */
01670         RTIOsapiHeap_freeStructure(ptr);
01671 
01672         /* Pointer to the previous freed element should be set to NULL */
01673         self->tag_elements[counter] = NULL;
01674 
01675         /* Next element to free */
01676         ptr = self->tag_elements[++counter];    
01677     }
01678 
01679     /* Finalizing attributes of the given input object */
01680     if (self->attr != NULL) {
01681         for( i = 0; i < self->attr_length; i++){
01682             if (self->attr[i] != NULL) {
01683                 RTIOsapiHeap_freeString(self->attr[i]);
01684             }
01685         }
01686 
01687         RTIOsapiHeap_freeArray(self->attr);
01688     }
01689 
01690     /* Finalizing the base RTIXMLObject of the given input object */    
01691     DDS_XMLObject_finalize(&self->base);  
01692 
01693 }
01694 
01695 
01707 const struct DDS_TypeCode* XML_parser::get_type_code_from_XML(struct DDS_XMLObject *xml,
01708                                                               const char *type_name,
01709                                                               struct DDS_XMLContext *context1)
01710 {
01711     struct DDS_XMLObject * xml_object = NULL;
01712     const struct DDS_TypeCode * type_code;
01713     const char * tag_name = NULL;
01714     struct DDS_XMLContext tmp_context, *context;
01715 
01716 
01717     if(xml == NULL) {
01718         cerr << "XML definition of " << type_name << " type is empty" << endl;
01719         return NULL;
01720     }
01721 
01722     context = context1 ? context1 : &tmp_context;
01723 
01724     xml_object = DDS_XMLObject_get_root(xml);
01725     if(xml_object == NULL){
01726         cerr << "Error getting DOM from the definition of " << type_name << endl;
01727         context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01728         return NULL;
01729     }
01730 
01731     /* Find the 'types' tag if any, that should be at the first level */
01732 
01733     xml_object = DDS_XMLObject_get_first_child(xml_object);
01734     while (xml_object != NULL) {
01735         if (!strcmp("type_definition", DDS_XMLObject_get_tag_name(xml_object))) {
01736             break;
01737         }
01738         xml_object = DDS_XMLObject_get_next_sibling(xml_object);
01739     }
01740     
01741     if(xml_object == NULL){
01742         cerr << "No tag 'type_defininiton', so no type definitions at all" << endl;
01743         return NULL;
01744     }
01745 
01746     xml_object = DDS_XMLObject_lookup(xml_object, type_name);
01747 
01748     if(xml_object == NULL){
01749         /* This type is not defined */
01750         return NULL;
01751     }
01752 
01753     tag_name = DDS_XMLObject_get_tag_name(xml_object);
01754 
01755     if (tag_name == NULL || 
01756         (strcmp(tag_name,"struct") &&
01757         strcmp(tag_name,"union") &&
01758         strcmp(tag_name,"enum") &&
01759         strcmp(tag_name,"valuetype") &&
01760         strcmp(tag_name,"sparse_valuetype"))) {
01761         cerr << "This is not a type definition" << endl;
01762         context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01763         return NULL;
01764     }
01765 
01766     type_code = DDS_XMLTypeCode_get_dds_typecode((struct DDS_XMLTypeCode *)xml_object);
01767     if(type_code == NULL){
01768         /* Parser error: requesting something that is not a type definition */
01769         cerr << type_name << ": Bad type definition" << endl;
01770         context->error = RTI_TRUE;
01771         return NULL;
01772     }
01773 
01774     return type_code;
01775 
01776 }
